name: Jungle Camping in Narkanda
description: A little, lovely town called Narkanda offers stunning views of the snow-covered mountains.
long_description: The campsite is situated at a distance of 2.4 km from the Narkanda bus stand and is easily accessible with the help of public or private transportation. Arrive at the campsite and get settled into your respective camps. Explore the surrounding nature and go on short hikes or treks near the campsite.

name: Solang Valley Camping
description: It is a beautiful and picturesque Camps at the top of the Kullu Manali valley in Himachal Pradesh, India.
long_description: A hub for adventure lovers, Solang Valley also is one of the most picturesque places in Himachal Pradesh.This camping activity in Solang Valley takes you through the scenic landscapes overlooking Manali. This nature camping experience offers ten luxury tents and twenty alpine tents to campers with rich and adventure mixed service, you never experienced before.

name: Moonlake Camping
description: Moonlake Camps, located at an altitude of 4300m, provides luxurious and comfortable accommodation to travelers and adventure junkies at the famous Chandratal Lake.
long_description: A perfect camping location for travelers at famous Chandertaal Lake in Lahaul & Spiti.Moonlake Camps, located at an altitude of 4300m, provides luxurious and comfortable accommodation to travelers and adventure junkies at the famous Chandratal Lake. Moonlake camps offers imported Swiss Cottage type accommodation.

name: Sethan Camping
description: Manali is famous for its various camping experiences that you can find spread all across the hill. And if you plan on going offbeat, then this campsite in the unexplored zone of Sethan in Manali is just perfect for you.
long_description: Sethan is a small Buddhist village located 14 KM away from Manali amidst the tall pine trees and snow-capped mountains. Not too far yet so far, Sethan is a secluded place to spend a weekend away from the over touristy vibes of Manali. Despite being an offbeat destination Sethan has a plethora of activities like snowboarding, skiing, trekking, angling, bouldering, camping, hiking and milky way that do not let you bored.It is a perfect place to see the famous Dhauldhar & Pir Panjal mountain range. It is magnificent to see the flowing Beas river at the bottom of Sethan dividing the Pir Panjal and Dhauldhar mountain range.

name: Living Stone Camp
description: Living Stone River Side Camping Bir:-Located in Bir in the Himachal Pradesh region, LivingStone Riverside Camping Bir provides accommodations with free private parking.
long_description: Located in Bīr in the Himachal Pradesh region, LivingStone Riverside Camping Bir provides accommodation with free private parking. The property has river views. The luxury tent features family rooms.All units at the luxury tent are equipped with a seating area. The units include bed linen.Guests at the luxury tent can enjoy a buffet breakfast.Guests can also relax in the garden.The nearest airport is Kangra Airport, 66 km from LivingStone Riverside Camping Bir.

name: Fogg Hill Camping
description: Top the arrangements done by Fogg-Hill Camping, whether it is your baggage support, bus support, trekking gear support or any local support.
long_description: Up above in the hills between the vast grasslands is Fogg Hill Camp at Prashar Lake, Mandi. Prashar Lake is yet another magical place of Himachal, dedicated to Prasher Rishi, a local deity. A place is easily accessible from Delhi and Chandigarh and away from the hustle of city life.The Fogg hill camp also offers trekking along with camping, bonfire, and activities like snow trekking, etc. Have a blast with your friends and family amidst the foggy hills and make memories for life.

name: CBB Camping Bir Billing
description: Providing city views, CBB - Camp Bir Billing in Bir provides accommodation, a garden,a shared lounge and a terrace.
long_description: CBB (Camp Bir Billing) is a perfect place for not only those who want to unwind, relax, read, meditate, paint and enjoy the untouched nature in a serene mountain surrounding but as well as for those who are looking for a more active and adventurous holiday with day hikes, cycling excursions, high altitude treks, off road driving, nature walks, biking and not to forget Paragliding at one of the finest places in world at Bir/Billing.CBB is just 4km up from the world-famous Paragliding site of Bir/Billing.

name: Camping Rakkar
description: Camp Rakkar is the first to introduce glamping at Dharamshala in the foothills of the Himalayas through its spacious swiss cottage tents and unorthodox settings.
long_description: Luxury tent camp Rakkar is located at Rakkar Road sidhbari Dharamshala in Dharmsāla in 5.2 km from the centre. Camp Rakkar is a sustainable luxury tent in Dharmsala, where guests can makes the most of its indoor pool, open-air bath and garden. This luxury tent provides free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 7.2 km from HPCA Stadium.
